instructionsModal.title: App Guide
instructionsModal.closeText: Click outside the modal or use the 'X' button to close.

playerBar.selectPlayer: Select Player: Tap a player disk to select it for placement.
playerBar.deselectPlayer: Deselect Player: Tap the selected player disk again or tap the bar background.
playerBar.scrollBar: Scroll Bar: If players overflow, swipe horizontally to scroll.

fieldArea.movePlayer: Move Player/Opponent: Drag a disk placed on the field.
fieldArea.addPlacePlayer: Add/Place Player: Select a player from the top bar, then tap or drag to the field.
fieldArea.removePlayer: Remove Player/Opponent: Double-tap/click a disk on the field.
fieldArea.drawLines: Draw Lines: Drag on an empty area of the field.

controlBar.toggleNames: Show/hide player names on the field.
controlBar.placeAllPlayers: Automatically place all selected players on the field in a formation.
controlBar.addOpponent: Add an opponent marker to the center of the field.
controlBar.resetField: Clear all players, opponents, and drawings from the field.
controlBar.hardResetConfirmation: Are you sure you want to completely reset the application? All saved data (players, stats, positions) will be permanently lost.

timerOverlay.subAlerts: Sub Alerts: Yellow = 1 min warning, Red = Due.
timerOverlay.playTimeHistory: View Play Time: Lists completed intervals and last confirmation time.

general.touchInteractions: Touch: Double-tap is used for removing/editing.
general.saving: Saving: All changes are saved automatically to your browser.

warmup.title: Match Preparation
warmup.section1Goal: Goal: Create a positive atmosphere and review the day's agenda.
section1Points: High fives, fist bumps, check-ins – sharing how everyone is doing.
Day's themes (max 3, e.g.): Enjoy, Compete, Dribble or Pass.
Themes based on training – can vary, but "Enjoy" is always included.
warmup.section2Goal: Goal: Raise body temperature, tune minds for the game.
section2Activities: Two lines + marker 5m away (cone/vest), circle around outside to the back of own line.
Jump to partner's side (2 times per movement).
Animal movements: inchworm, bear walk, duck walk (kids can suggest).
Sprints (approx. 5): standing start, sitting start, push-up start.
warmup.section3Goal: Goal: Activate ball touch and prepare for the game.
section3PairWorkPoints: Basic passing close → further away (game stance, balls of feet, inside foot, care).
section3GoalieWarmupPoints: Throws/passes from close (2m) and further away:
Up, side, air, ground (getting used to the ball).
section3CombinedGoalieWarmupPoints: GK in goal → wall pass → shot from 16m / between pen. spot & box (coach can be wall).
warmup.section4Goal: Goal: Final preparations before the game.
section4Points: Timing just before entering the field (game leader ready).
duringGamePoints: Encourage good plays (e.g., fist bumps, "Yes!", "Just like we practiced!").
Let the player make their own decisions – guide only off-the-ball players and subs if needed.

exampleDrills.title: Example Drills
exampleDrills.description: This is where drill descriptions and instructions would go. You can structure this similarly to the warmup plan using sections and lists.
